casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Daniel LUNA No. 406P17-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Mr. Daniel Luna, for Luna, Daniel Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Mr. Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 1st of June 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, New Hanover County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of June 2018 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of June 2018 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
